name: frustratingly
content:

in a way that makes you feel annoyed because you cannot achieve what you want: Solving these problems is proving to be expensive and frustratingly slow. Frustratingly, no one wanted to speak to the police about the theft.
More examplesFewer examplesFrustratingly, every success has been followed by a failure.This type of injury can take a frustratingly long time to heal.While her voice is rich and powerful, it is frustratingly difficult to hear all the lyrics properly.
